resources.string: By clicking "signup", I agree to Worla terms and conditions and privacy policy.

No need to physically visit our offices anymore.

 This app enables you to access and request services directly from our offices.
It contains about 100 frequently asked questions.

 This app also helps you to calculate your electricity bill from your mobile device. Whenever, wherever you need require our services, you are just a click away.


 Welcome to the new world....
